Package io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.data.provider

Interface BlockLootProviderBase.GenericLootModifier

All Superinterfaces:
BlockLootProviderBase.LootFactory
All Known Subinterfaces:
BlockLootProviderBase.LootModifier
Enclosing class:
BlockLootProviderBase
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public static interface BlockLootProviderBase.GenericLootModifier extends BlockLootProviderBase.LootFactory
Interface to modify a singleton loot entry to a new loot entry. This can also be used as a BlockLootProviderBase.LootFactory in which case the default item entry obtained from BlockLootProviderBase.SimpleLootFactory.item() is passed to the apply method.
